text:
I’m considering building a way for users to create their own custom tab titles for the extension.

Can anyone tell me outside of these items what you would find useful to have in your tab title?
• emojii
•  Portal Name
• Portal ID
• Abbreviated section name(where you are in the backend: DM for Design Manager)
• Section name (not abbreviated, just simply where you are: Design Manager)

not sure if possible, but the most useful thing for me would be swapping the favicon for something tool-specific. I definitely never have 50+ tabs open in one window on a 13 inch laptop..... never.....

Favicon is a good idea, one we’ve considered, though there is a con to doing it. HubSpot’s notification system updates the favicon when you have a notification. if we update it, it would likely interfere with the notification.

That said this isn’t out of the realm of possibility

This is kinda what I’m thinking:
<https://codepen.io/thewebtech/pen/LXVOwa>
would love to hear more suggestions for things you could put in the tab title that would be useful
